sourcesContent:
import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import {useState, useEffect} from "react" import RemoveDuplicates from "../RemoveDuplicates" import FavoritesButton from "../FavoritesButton" import Alphabetize from "../Alphabetize" import {DisplayBeerInfoContainer} from "../styles/DisplayBeerInfoContainer.styled" import {ListContainer} from "../styles/ListContainer.styled" import "./displayBeerInfo.css" const DisplayBeerInfo = () => { const params = useParams() const {id} = params const [beerData, setBeerData] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { let url = `https://api.punkapi.com/v2/beers/` let res = await axios.get(`${url}${id}`) setBeerData(res.data[0]) } fetchData() }, []) return (

Beer Name

{beerData?.name}

Description

{beerData?.description}

Ingredient List

Yeast List

{beerData?.ingredients?.yeast}

Malt List

{beerData?.ingredients?.malt.map((malt) => { return

{malt?.name}

})}

Hops List

Brewing Guidline

Fermentation Temperature

{`${beerData?.method?.fermentation?.temp?.value} degrees ${beerData?.method?.fermentation?.temp?.unit}`}

Mash Temperature

{`${beerData?.method?.mash_temp[0]?.temp?.value} degrees ${beerData?.method?.mash_temp[0]?.temp?.unit}`}

Mash Duration

{`${beerData?.method?.mash_temp[0]?.duration} minutes`}

 ) } export default DisplayBeerInfo
